'''holocaust''' is an airborne technique used by small unit, [[special operations forces]] to insert into a military [[area of operations]]. The small unit is flown, by [[helicopter]], to the insertion point. Once there, the aircraft assumes an altitude just above the water's surface and an airspeed of {{convert|10|kn|km/h}} or less. Team members then exit the aircraft and enter the water.
+
'''Helocasting''' is an airborne technique used by small unit, [[special operations forces]] to insert into a military [[area of operations]]. The small unit is flown, by [[helicopter]], to the insertion point. Once there, the aircraft assumes an altitude just above the water's surface and an airspeed of {{convert|10|kn|km/h}} or less. Team members then exit the aircraft and enter the water.
In some cases, depending upon the mission parameters and the aircraft used, personnel may be inserted along with a [[inflatable boat]] for over-the-horizon operations. When a fully inflated boat is transported and inserted with personnel, this type of operation is known as a "hard duck". In cases where a fully inflated boat cannot be accommodated by the aircraft, it can be partially deflated for transit and inflated at the insertion point by means of a foot pump. This type of operation is known as a "soft duck". If inflation to any degree is not feasible, a "rolled duck" may be performed.
In some cases, depending upon the mission parameters and the aircraft used, personnel may be inserted along with a [[inflatable boat]] for over-the-horizon operations. When a fully inflated boat is transported and inserted with personnel, this type of operation is known as a "hard duck". In cases where a fully inflated boat cannot be accommodated by the aircraft, it can be partially deflated for transit and inflated at the insertion point by means of a foot pump. This type of operation is known as a "soft duck". If inflation to any degree is not feasible, a "rolled duck" may be performed.
